name: TETR.IO PLUS Settings File
summary: A TPSE file contains settings a TETR.IO PLUS user loads to set different aspects of TETR.IO gameplay (in the Windows desktop version), such as music, sound effects, and game appearance. TETR.IO PLUS is a program that modifies TETR.IO, a Tetris variant available online and for desktop PCs.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
